channel.title: Proximity/Blessed ~ World PVP |Need A Development Team|
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/839/coollogocom7888100.png/][IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/3759/coollogocom7888100.png[/img][/URL]
[center][size=36pt]This is a World PVP server.[/size][/center]
[center]I need a development team[/center] [center]I already have done alot of the work in the server, it's basically ready. i just want content and web designer, so on.[/center] [center]*More Developers[/center] [center]*Web Designers[/center]
[center]No website or anything atm.. :([/center]
[center]I wanted to have a unique server and ended up working on World PVP instead of BH.[/center]
[center]Developers Work.[/center] [center]Added New World pvp system..[/center] [center]I'm going to make weapons hit correctly.[/center] [center]I WILL UPDATE THIS[/center]
[center]Few Pictures of PVP[/center] [center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/12/dwm2012123018512890.png/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/39/dwm2012123018512890.png[/img][/URL] [/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/688/dwm2012123018552123.png/][IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/2665/dwm2012123018552123.png[/img][/URL] [/center]
[center][size=24pt]Planning If i should have a Development Team. Intrested? PM or Comment [/size][/center]
[center]Proximity Team[/center] [center]Me. :([/center]

item.title: Proximity/Blessed ~ World PVP |Need A Development Team|
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:8, topic:477088”]for some reason i like the fact your using old context menus. replace the 602 animations with 474.

good luck.[/quote]

I don’t know how to do that if i did, i’d certainly keep bh.

Read full topic

item.title: Proximity/Blessed ~ World PVP |Need A Development Team|
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:6, topic:477088”]Marcbob: Bounty Hunter isn’t his, I do believe it’s Dan’s. (Xx Weed Xx) I could be wrong though.

Good luck.[/quote]

Never heard of him. The base is from IQuality. + i fixed several combat bugs/changed the WHOLE system. This video is a bit of fixing bugs, i just fixed most of em already. + it’s not gnna be bh. This is a World PVP. I’ll provide pics in a bit.

Read full topic

Good luck.
